curtain.menu.title: Current Curtain Mod rules:
curtain.menu.change: The value of %s has been changed to %s
curtain.menu.change.default: The default value of %s has been changed to %s
curtain.rules.language.name: Language
curtain.rules.xp_no_cooldown.name: XpNoCoolDown
curtain.rules.xp_no_cooldown.desc: Players absorb XP instantly, without delay.
curtain.rules.allow_spawning_offline_pla: Weather allow spawn offline players using /player command.
curtain.rules.command_player.name: CommandPlayer
curtain.rules.view_distance.name: ViewDistance
curtain.rules.view_distance.desc: Change the server sight distance, set to 0 to use the default value.
curtain.rules.command_log.name: CommandLog
curtain.rules.command_log.desc: Enables /log command to monitor events via chat and overlays.
curtain.rules.missing_tools.name: MissingTools
curtain.rules.missing_tools.desc: Glass can be broken faster with pickaxes.
curtain.rules.flipping_cactus.name: FlippingCactus
curtain.rules.flipping_cactus.desc: Players can flip and rotate blocks when holding cactus.
curtain.rules.rotator_block.name: RotatorBlock
curtain.rules.placement_rotation_fix.des: fixes block placement rotation issue when player rotates quickly while placing blocks.
curtain.rules.fill_updates.name: FillUpdates
curtain.rules.fill_updates.desc: fill/clone/setblock and structure blocks cause block updates
curtain.rules.interaction_updates.name: InteractionUpdates
curtain.rules.default_loggers.name: DefaultLoggers
curtain.rules.default_loggers.desc: sets these loggers in their default configurations for all new players
curtain.rules.open_fake_player_inventory: Allow player to open the fake player's inventory
curtain.rules.open_fake_player_ender_che: Allow player to open the fake player's ender chest
curtain.rules.stackable_shulker_boxes.de: Empty shulker boxes can stack when thrown on the ground.
curtain.rules.super_lead.name: Super Lead
curtain.rules.super_lead.desc: Villagers and monsters can be tethered (tethering monsters requires the client to install Curtain as well)
curtain.rules.desert_shrubs.name: Desert Shrubs
curtain.rules.desert_shrubs.desc: Saplings turn into dead shrubs in hot climates and no water access
curtain.rules.xp_from_explosions.name: XP From Explosions
curtain.rules.xp_from_explosions.desc: Experience will drop from all experience barring blocks with any explosion type
curtain.rules.creative_no_clip.name: Creative No Clip
curtain.rules.creative_no_clip.desc:
On servers it needs to be set on both
client and server to function properly.
Has no effect when set on the server only
Can allow to phase through walls
if only set on the carpet client side
but requires some trapdoor magic to
allow the player to enter blocks
curtain.rules.optimized_tnt.name: Optimized TNT
curtain.rules.optimized_tnt.desc: TNT causes less lag when exploding in the same spot and in liquids
curtain.rules.tnt_random_range.name: TNT Random Range
curtain.rules.tnt_random_range.desc:
Sets the tnt random explosion range to a fixed value
Set to -1 for default behavior
curtain.rules.tnt_primer_momentum_remove: Removes random TNT momentum when primed
curtain.rules.hardcode_tnt_angle.name: Hardcode TNT angle
curtain.rules.hardcode_tnt_angle.desc:
Sets the horizontal random angle on TNT for debugging of TNT contraptions
Set to -1 for default behavior
curtain.rules.merge_tnt.name: Merge TNT
curtain.rules.ctrl_q_crafting_fix.name: Ctrl+Q Crafting Fix
curtain.rules.ctrl_q_crafting_fix.desc: Dropping entire stacks works also from on the crafting UI result slot
curtain.rules.quick_leaf_decay.name: Quick Leaf Decay
curtain.rules.quick_leaf_decay.desc: Leaves fall off quickly after cutting down a tree
curtain.rules.custom_motd.name: Custom MOTD
curtain.rules.custom_motd.desc:
Sets a different motd message on client trying to connect to the server
use '_' to use the startup setting from server.properties
curtain.rules.turtle_egg_trampled_disabl: Stopping turtle eggs from being destroyed by physical trampling
curtain.rules.farmland_trampled_disabled: Stopping farmlands from being destroyed by physical trampling
curtain.rules.fake_player_name_prefix.de: Add the specified prefix to the name of the fake player summoned by the /player command
curtain.rules.fake_player_name_suffix.de: Add the specified prefix to the name of the fake player summoned by the /player command
curtain.rules.scaffolding_distance.name: Scaffolding Distance
curtain.rules.fake_player_auto_fish.name: fakePlayerAutoFish
curtain.rules.fake_player_auto_fish.desc: Make fake player to auto fish.
curtain.rules.better_sign_interaction.de: Only the axe with "Strip" in its name is allowed to peel logs
curtain.rules.better_wood_strip.name: Better Wood Strip
curtain.rules.better_wood_strip.desc: Make the block attached to the sign interact when you right-click it
curtain.rules.better_fence_gate_placemen: Make the placed fence gate have the same block status as the fence gate you clicked
curtain.rules.fake_player_resident.name: Fake Player Resident
curtain.rules.fake_player_resident.desc: Keep the fake player when exiting the level
curtain.rules.fake_player_auto_replenish: Make fake player to auto replenishment
curtain.rules.fake_player_auto_replace_t: Make fake player to auto replace almost damaged tool
curtain.rules.block_placement_ignore_ent: Disable entity collision check before block placement, aka you can place blocks inside entities
curtain.rules.empty_shulker_box_stack_al: Empty Shulker Boxes will always stack, even inside inventories.
curtain.rules.chicken_shearing.name: Chicken Shearing
curtain.rules.chicken_shearing.desc: Chickens can be sheared to get feathers. Beware! every time u shear a chicken, it gets damaged!
curtain.rules.anti_cheat_disabled.name: AntiCheatDisabled
curtain.rules.anti_cheat_disabled.desc: Prevents players from rubberbanding when moving too fast
